name: Tank Off (itch)
description:
Multiplayer Tank-Centric  Capture-The-Flag Battle Arena

Arcade-Style Rocket-Powered Tanks !

https://martiangames.com/vid/tank-off-2-720x444.mp4

Tanks Can: 

  • Jump!  [SPACE key]
  • Turbo!  [SHIFT]
  • Float and Jet through water!
  • Rocket-Propel through the air!

The game is currently 2 years into development, and we are now entering a pre-BETA phase!  During this phase the game is offered for free!  We just request that you please participate in the community discussions on Discord:  https://discord.gg/KbBMHkn

Features:

  • Multiplayer!  10-Player Rooms
  • Unlock 3 Tanks .. (2 more are currently in development)
  • Choose from 3 Maps:  Forest, Desert, or Military Base  (more maps on the way!)
  • Upgrade Attributes like:  Speed, Turbo Recharge, Reload Speed, Cannon Damage, etc
  • Hang out, Chat and make new friends!

NOTE:  Some anti-virus software may not like our patcher, because it needs to write files to your drive.   Feel free to email me at:  MartianGames@gmail.com  I'll be happy to give you a zip without the patcher.
